description: A reduction in 2019 shows the message not to drink and drive is "getting through", police say.
title: Number of Christmas drink-drive arrests falls on Isle of Man
title_page: Number of Christmas drink-drive arrests falls on Isle of Man - BBC News
maintext: Insp Tomlinson said while the figures were encouraging, the ages of those arrested, which "ranged from teenagers to the elderly", showed that "people of all ages still need to be educated".
